text:
We're one episode into this season of The Real Housewives of Atlanta and it already looks like there's a bit of a beef brewing between NeNe Leakes and Porsha Williams. When Porsha confronted NeNe about saying that she should be fired during an appearance on Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen at the end of April, NeNe was not having any of it, which prompted Porsha to call her out for seeming to not own up to her comments.

How to Watch Watch The Real Housewives of Atlanta on Peacock. Stream Now on

NeNe still denied making that statement on WWHL when she returned to the Clubhouse to dish on the RHOA season premiere on Sunday night. Even though it may have seemed like NeNe did feel that way about Porsha, she explains why that's not exactly what she said in the video, above.

Related

So is NeNe or Porsha right in this argument? For what it's worth, about 64 percent of the WWHL audience said they were on NeNe's side in her disagreement with Porsha.

Watch NeNe give her shade-filled take on some of the other things the RHOA ladies have said about her so far this season, below.
title: NeNe Leakes Denies Saying Porsha Williams Should Be Fired: Video
